comment:
* Pool of object of a given type to pick from to help memory usage
 * @xsl.usage internal

variables.name: objectType
variables.comment:
Type of objects in this pool.
   *  @serial

variables.name: freeStack
variables.comment:
Stack of given objects this points to.
   *  @serial

methods.name: public synchronized Object getInstanceIfFree()
methods.comment:
* Get an instance of the given object in this pool if available
   *
   *
   * @return an instance of the given object if available or null

methods.name: public synchronized Object getInstance()
methods.comment:
* Get an instance of the given object in this pool 
   *
   *
   * @return An instance of the given object

methods.name: public synchronized void freeInstance(Object obj)
methods.comment:
* Add an instance of the given object to the pool  
   *
   *
   * @param obj Object to add.
